runs.comm: begins the second innings with a short of a length, outside of off, which gets some movement away
Rohit already into a mix-up as he looks for the dab-and-run outside of off, but is sent back by Dhawan when he sees the close-in fielder haring on the ball
edged away outside of off as Rohit gets away a fortuitous boundary through third man. Did not look convincing as this flew away off the edge
short of a length and fended away off the back foot towards the off side
fires one well down the leg side as Taylor does well to reach this as he dove fully to his left
width and punished by Rohit as he is able to caress this away off the back foot through backward point, with this having enough on it to get to the rope in the end
finishes with a peach of a delivery, on a slightly back of a length, as this one just nibbles away as Rohit presented the blade
elects to let this one go through to the keeper
shortish length which goes across Dhawan as Taylor collected from behind
first delivery he offers a stroke to, as this fuller one just deviates away after he looked for the push through long off
finally gets bat on ball, but is unable to steal a single through the mid-off region
gets in a lunge before allowing this fuller one to go through to the keeper
starts his spell with a maiden over as Dhawan continues to exercise restraint outside his off stump
length delivery, pitched wide of off, as this one bends away upon pitching
length delivery now which is bunted away towards the leg side with soft hands
punches away this back of a length outside of off, finding some space at mid-off to get the run
curls his line into the left-hander as this fullish length is met with the full face
content to allow this slightly back of a length, and going across, to go through to Taylor
drops the length a touch as this one is negotiated close to the body by Dhawan on the off side
slings in a length delivery which is respected in equal measure by the batsman
straying on the pads as Rohit is given license to clip this away through fine leg
slips in the full delivery on middle and off which is dug out by Dhawan
pushes at this shortish length going across, but can't target any vacant space in the covers
slides on the pads as Dhawan is able to flick this away to just get this ball over the boundary at deep midwicket, despite the chase from the fielder
now eases away this fullish length, going across, to the off side to end the over
slanting delivery on the pads which is helped away through midwicket as Rohit is able to return for two
angling again down the pads as this is clipped away behind of square for another brace
short of a length from Panyangara, outside of off, which is respected by Rohit
a sliver of luck for Rohit as he gets away with this edge to this fullish length that shapes away as he presented the bat. Ends up being reined in by the boundary rider at third man
tries to slap away a drive off the back foot, but the lack of width hurt his chances there
now elects to get away a run on the leg side, but is held by the short midwicket fielder
length delivery outside of off which is played away to point, as Dhawan backed a country mile before going back to his end
attempts to get away a cut to this length delivery outside of off, but the pace did him in there
overpitched just outside of off, but driven straight to the man at mid-off
looks for the elegant drive on the front foot, but picks out the short cover fielder instead
now gets away a drive through midwicket, which the pair have to scamper hard for as there is pressure from the short midwicket fielder, who fires in an errant throw at the non-striker's
fires in a full, inswinging delivery that just misses off as Dhawan played all around this

Zimbabwe into business now as they remove the ever-dangerous Rohit from the middle as he looked to heave away this length delivery through the on side, before getting a leading edge high over to the cover region, with Raza back-peddling a bit before claiming this as he fell onto his back. Didn't quite look the part, but perhaps was looking to up the rate a touch
gets this length delivery to nibble away as it went across the batsman
dead-bats this shortish length angling into him from middle and leg stump
elects to let this length delivery go across after backing away initially

Tinashe on fire here at Auckland as Dhawan now has to depart from the middle after attempting an ill-advised cut to this short of a length which was bowled across him. Just wasn't enough room for him to get away the stroke as this crashed back onto the stumps
ends with a dot delivery as the Zimbabwean fielders each take a turn to congratulate him for what has been a huge over for them
rocks forward to meet this fuller length delivery outside of off
allows this back of a length to shape away outside of off
ends up striking this one straight to the man at mid-off
this time picks the gap past mid-off with a drive to get off the mark in spanking style
on a good length and well outside off as Kohli is happy to let it go
too straight as this is simply bread-and-butter stuff for Kohli as he plays the trademark flick through midwicket to earn another boundary
gets in a good lunge before angling away this full, wide delivery through the gap at gully to third man
looking to guide this one the up through long on, but the fielder is able to get behind this comfortably
allows this length delivery to fly through to the keeper outside his off stump
looks for the dab-and-run outside his off stump, as Kohli is able to turn on the jets and beat the incoming Raza to the non-striker's
gets forward to this fuller one outside of off, with this one tantalising close to the presented bat
gets forward to isolate any movement, as this one is squirted away towards the point region
shortish length which Rahane is content to defend as a good over for Zimbabwe comes to a close
shoulders arms to this length ball delivered well wide of off stump
carbon copy of the last delivery, but perhaps a touch closer to the batsman now if you want to get into the nitty, gritty side of things
fires in another one on the margin, as the umpire this time penalises the bowler for straying over the mark
short of a length now as Kohli remains patient outside his off stump
another one that is well over the margin as Chatara is punished once more
gets in a good stride before meeting this length delivery outside his off stump
driven down to mid-off, with the subsequent bobble from Mire allowing the run to be taken the end
fuller length which is respected by Rahane as the first ten overs of this chase in Auckland are wrapped up
defends away this length delivery outside his off stump
once again defended outside of his off stump by Rahane
overpitched and obliged by Rahane as he caresses away a sumptuous drive through long off. Just raced away after beating the dive from mid-off
now looks to steer one through long on, but doesn't quite get it away
in the slot and driven away crisply through the covers as this one slows up just before trickling over the extra-cover rope
looks to push away a single through mid-off, but is held by the close-in fielder in the end
drives this length delivery competently on the up to deep extra-cover
Chatara shortens his length outside off. Rahane stays back and pushes it towards short cover with a straight bat
tad fuller and well outside off as Rahane closes the face of the bat and drives it towards mid-off
fuller and wobbling away from off as Rahane blocks it towards cover
nicely on the front foot as this one is defended away towards the right of the bowler
back of a length and just outside off as Rahane punches it towards point
Kohli greets him with a push through the off side to get off the strike
steers this away off the back foot through the cover region
does well to reach out to this length delivery, before sending it away streakily to the fielder in the deep at third man
on the front foot as this is guided away softly through the leg side for a tight single
tries to glide one past the man at point, but fails to do in the end
straying down the leg side as Kohli overbalances a touch as he looked for the tickle away through fine leg. Taylor does well to complete the take and whip off the bails, but Kohli was safe
punches back this slightly short of a length to end Mupariwa's opening over
shortish length which is delivered wide of off as Rahane slices this up and over through third man to register a boundary
fullish length which is now turned away towards the mid-on region
shortish length which is fended away to the man at point
nicely into position as he executed the cover drive, but Raza is able to pounce on this to intercept the ball
full delivery, outside of off, which is squirted away towards extra-cover
not in control of this drive on the up as it goes aerially over the cover region to the fielder in the deep
short of a length which is bunted away to the off side
caresses this length delivery away to the short mid-off fielder
slanting on the pads now as Kohli gets away this clip through midwicket, running the first one hard in order to come back in time for the second
uses that strong bottom hand to muscle this straight down the ground to find the boundary
now gets away a whip to this fuller delivery to the man at long on
eases away this slightly back of a length to the cover region
short ball which carries nicely to the keeper behind as Kohli was not interested to engage
shoulders arms to this back of a length outside of off
short of a length and punched away through the covers as they are restricted to just the single in the end
meets this length delivery outside of off, but fails to squeeze it past the man at point. Doesn't stop them from running the single though
crashes away this short of a length towards sweeper cover
tries to dab this one past the fielder at point, but to no avail
short of a length and slanting down leg as Rahane waits for this to come on to him before helping it away through fine leg
eases away a single now through long on. Brings up their fifty-run stand as well

fuller length, outside of off, as this is driven away towards the close-in fielder at cover. Rahane wanted the run, but it was never on as the fielder is able to flick back a throw at the stumps, with Taylor picking up the slack to disturb the bails as Rahane dived. The toe end of the bat may have been in the air though as he tried to ground it in. Very similar to what happened to Chris Jordan recently in the match against Bangladesh. And sure enough, Rahane has to go as his bat was indeed in the air before the bails were disturbed. The misunderstanding has paid dividends for Zimbabwe
gets off the mark with a dab down through third man
length delivery shaping on the pads as this is nudged away on the on side
crashes away this wide, back of a length delivery to the man at sweeper cover
shortish length which is glided down to the fielder at third man
clips away this length delivery honing on the pads as this was delivered across of him

gets into position to hook away this short ball from Mire, but is late on it as Taylor goes up for an appeal for caught behind. Mire's performance wasn't as convincing though as the umpire remains nonplussed
delivers another accurate bouncer which Raina is unable to manipulate away
fuller length which is tucked away on the leg side with soft hands
full delivery which is steered away through long on to end the over
guides this short of a length to the fielder at long on
length delivery which is allowed to carry through to the keeper
is late on this fuller length delivery which strikes him outside of leg
eases away this length delivery, going across, gently towards the off side
nurdles away a single through the leg side to get off the strike
clips away this delivery off the pads through backward square
glances away this length delivery off the pads through square-leg
fends away this short of a length which climbs on him from middle and leg
now blazes away a drive just to the right of backward point as this screamed away to the rope. Release shot which should take some pressure off
now looks to steer one away through backward point, but the fielder is able to get his body behind it comfortably
sends in the bumper now which Kohli was surprised by as he went through for a false pull
fuller now as this is tucked away to the close-in fielder on the leg side
digs out this fuller one going across him towards the man at long off
steers away this length delivery straight down the ground
into the slot, but picks out one of the fielders on the ring on the off side
tries to open the face and run this one past the fielder at short third man, but fails to do so
now gets away a single towards extra-cover
fends away this length delivery outside of off to end the over
spins this one into him on the pads, as he tucked it away gently on the leg side
lucky to get away with this uppish clip that just fell short of the man at short backward square
Raina looking a touch unsure as this one now stops on him, leading him to chip at this through mid-on, but luckily, away from any fielders

Raina playing the gamble as he now positions himself to slam away this leg-side delivery through backward square, with the fielder in the vicinity flinging himself to his left to try and get to this. Ends up rocketing away to the boundary
picks up a single now through square-leg
eases away a drive through to extra-cover to keep the strike
begins from round the wicket as Kohli is able to whip this away past the short backward square to land up at long leg
tries to guide one away off the back foot through the covers, but fails to do so
waits on the back foot before tucking this slider away through the leg side

and out of nowhere Raza has produced a huge wicket as he gets Kohli bowled around his legs, as the batsmen looked for the sweep round the corner. Kohli looked absolutely befuddled once the gravity of the situation came to light. Has to go for another 30-odd score this World Cup. India in real disarray now
tossed up and just outside off as Dhoni goes back to block it
looks to whip away a single through square-leg, but fails to get it away
tries to glance away this slider past backward square, but can't pick the spot
now goes for the paddle through fine leg, which he is able to get away
tossed up and on off as Dhoni lunges forward and defends
this one holds up on him as he lets go an uppish punch through long on. Lucky this did not go to hand though
cuts away now through the covers to get Raina on strike
looks to guide one past the mid-off fielder, but the man is alert to the opportunity
waltzes down to steer this flighted delivery to the man at long on
tries to find some space through midwicket, but to no avail
now looks to target the gap at fine leg, but doesn't quite middle away the sweep
punches away towards mid-off, but picks out the fielder
defended away from the confines of his crease
guides away a single down to long on to keep the strike
that is the Raina we have come to know as he steps out of the crease to attack this length delivery with a bludgeon over cow corner for four. That should help his confidence
this time stays in his crease as he defends this floater from the bowler
now sensibly gets away a single through long on to bring MS on strike
allows this one to continue through outside of off to the keeper
now looks to jab away through cover point, but picks out the fielder
gets in a stride before reaching out to this fuller one delivered slightly wide of off
continues from round the wicket as this one is defended back to him in his follow through
now tries to open the face to get it past short third man, but is unable to do so
looks to force this to the right of Raza, but he is all over this like white on rice
darted in on middle and leg as Raina eases this down to long on
flatter delivery on the pads which is turned away through square-leg
just works this one away softly behind of square to end the over
defends this one tossed up just outside of off
picks the gap between backward point and short third man as the pair are able to return back for the second
looking for the big heave over cow corner, but this arrived a touch slower to him as it crashes into the box. MS has a quiet word with his charge
flatter delivery on middle and leg which is swept away straight to short backward square
defended with the straightest of blades
now tries to force away a pull through deep backward square, but ends up finding the boundary rider quite comfortably
waltzes down before mishitting this attempted club towards deep midwicket
pushes at this one to get it just past the dive of Raza to long off
tries to finesse away a glide past short third man, but no can do
eases away a run down to long off to give MS the strike
comes down the track as he strikes this one fiercely to the long off boundary, with this one stopped with a tumble by Tinashe in the region
pushed on the back foot as he steers this one down to long on
Raina comes down the track and just gets away this bludgeon over midwicket for six. Met with huge cheers from the Indian contingent who had been slightly subdued over the past few overs
now this time lifts the flatter delivery high over long on, with this one sailing effortlessly over the boundary. Calculated strike that comes off to a tee for the southpaw
looked to make it three and three before Williams floated one slower to the batsman, which ends up being worked away softly on the leg side
now chips this one from over the wicket to the man at deep midwicket to get a single
guides away a single through long off to hand the strike back to Raina
gets the single through long on to keep the strike
dabs away a rushed single through third man
looking to come down before waiting on the back foot to nudge this away on the leg side
dropped a touch short as MS short-arm pulled this to the man at deep midwicket
steers away this tossed up delivery to the man at sweeper cover
tries to get this one past the man at mid-on, but he is more than equal to the task
now elects to go for the sweep, with this one striking him on the full, but outside of leg stump
pulls this short of a length on leg stump through fine leg
jabs away this back of a length towards the covers
short ball and dispatched by Dhoni through long leg with an emphatic pull. Met with resounding cheers from the Indian contingent at Eden Park
now afforded width outside of off, which he accepts with relish as he scythes away hard through third man to make it consecutive boundaries
straying on the pads as he glances this away through square-leg
pulls away this short of a length fine through the leg side, with deep fine leg coming round to collect
raises their fifty-run stand with a pull through to long on
lobs up a full toss which is swatted away baseball-style over the backward square boundary for four
now looks to guide it past the bowler, with the run not on initially after he made the diving stop, before the fumble had Dhoni getting down to the other end
looks to cut this away past backward point, but is unable to do so
floated up as this turns into a low full toss which is struck away through long off
comes down before drilling this one to long off to end the over
defended away on the front foot by Dhoni
this time gets it through extra-cover as India move to 150
gets in a good stride to meet this one which swings away
bunted away off the back foot towards midwicket
drags the length as this one is tucked away on the leg side
sends in a full, wide delivery which undoes what has otherwise been a great over so far
tries to tickle away a single past short fine leg, which they end up getting
advances down before re-adjusting the stroke to work this away through midwicket
tips away a single on the leg side now as Dhoni hares to the striker's end
tries to force this away just to the right of the bowler, but Raza does well to get low and intercept
drags the length down the leg side as Dhoni looked to take him on, before seeing the eventual result
continues to operate on that leg-stump line as Dhoni shimmied down before clipping away on the leg side
gets to the pitch beautifully to chip this one on the full towards long on. Dhoni is fast enough for them to complete a brace
dropped that could very well be the turning point as Hamilton makes a complete hash of this sweep round the corner from Raina which catches the top-edge to fly over to Hamilton at short fine leg
begins with a length delivery on the pads which is glanced away towards midwicket
good length delivery on the stumps which Dhoni flicks to midwicket
fails to get away this leg-side delivery behind of square
slapped away towards point, but can't pinch the single
Raina backs up way too much as Dhoni failed to defend this away after the ball struck the legs. Raina ends up having to dart back to his end, and put in a dive, to make his ground before the throw
picks the gap  to place it past the backward point and short third man for a boundary
length delivery going across the batsman as Raina is able to bring up his fifty with this inside-out drive through long off
now tries to dab away a run over backward point, but the fielder is up to it
punches away a single square off the wicket to get Dhoni on strike
angling on the pads as this is helped away on the leg side
glides away a single now through third man as Raina looks to press on to bigger things
tries to get away a run through the covers, but is held by the close-in fielder
shortish length which Raina looked to hook away through long leg, but ends up missing this, along with the keeper, as this continued through to the third man region

Zimbabwe starting to falter in the field here as short third man and backward point assist Dhoni in getting a boundary through third man. Williams was trying to scoop it over to short third man, but the fielder overran the throw, with this continuing through to the boundary
now helps himself to a single through backward square to get off the strike
opens the face to try and run this past short third man, but to no avail
read this slower bouncer from Chatara on leg stump as Raina is able to hook this away at the last moment through fine leg for a much-needed boundary
full and on the pads as this is clipped away for a brace through deep midwicket
drops this one short, and wide, as Dhoni is unable to do any better than glide this to backward point
shortish length which is defended back to the bowler
tries to steer one away through the covers, but picks out the close-in fielder
once again driven away on the off side, but can't pinch the gap
pulled away now over square-leg, with the boundary rider doing well to get to this and not let it through
guides away a single through the covers, with Raina getting through with the tight single to keep the strike
and he is sent high and mighty in that famous Raina zone as he bowled this one far too short to a batsman with a fifty to his name already
now tries the delicate dab which he timed away superbly, before short third man made the critical stop with his right hand. Saved a certain boundary there
brings up the 100-run stand with this steer through mid-on
fails to get this leg-side delivery away through fine leg, with the umpire calling a wide subsequently
full delivery, going across, as this is eased away to long off
shimmies down as he directs this away wide of long on to pickup three valuable runs
helps himself to a single down the leg side to keep the strike
rank ball, down the leg side, and Dhoni is given a gift early by Raza as he powers this away through long leg to pickup four
continues operating that leg-stump line as this one is turned away just behind of square
fails to get away this dab through the third man as the ball rushed past the bat to the keeper
delivers another, flatter delivery, which Raina fails to get at once more
content to glide away a single now through the covers
eases away a run on the leg side to keep the strike
pitched up and steered quite comfortably by Dhoni through long off

length delivery which just nibbles away as Raina overbalances. Taylor fails to collect this one though. Replays show Raina had lifted his foot temporarily, so a half-chance there for Zimbabwe which goes begging
in the slot and Raina is able to execute a crisp drive through the covers that beats the converging boundary rider to the rope
now slams away this fractionally short delivery over cow corner, with this one landing on the rope on the full
full delivery, swinging away outside of off, as Raina is able to pickup a brace with a drive down to deep cover
nurdles away a single on the leg side as a good over for India comes to a close
short ball, pitched wide as well, as this is struck away to sweeper cover
such delicate hands from Raina as he opens the face to run this fine through third man for a boundary
full, slower delivery, which is flicked away through fine leg, but called leg bye in the end

Dhoni gets to his 57th ODI fifty in another important match for India under pressure. Got to the milestone with a push away to the off side. Has been another excellent, calm innings from the Indian captain
gets an inside-edge onto the leg side, with the errant throw allowing them to come back for the second
nurdled away through midwicket as Raina retains the strike next over
goes round the wicket and slants a wide down the leg side
another delicate glide from Raina, played late, that is able to beat short third man with ease as this races away to the boundary
overpitched and driven on the full to long on
content to pick up a single through third man
eases away a single through long on
full toss which is above waist-height as this is clubbed away instinctively through fine leg to pickup four. May have gone off the midriff there, but still gets him the runs
steps out of his crease before trying to guide this one past the bowler in his follow through. Chatara feigns in a throw at Dhoni's end, which is met with resounding boos from the crowd
earns a dot ball to this fuller length which Dhoni is unable to get away
slow, back of a length delivery which is tickled away by Raina through fine leg to move him to 99

gets bat on ball to execute the drop single to perfection and earn a maiden World Cup ton. Met with huge cheers across the ground as he salutes the Auckland faithful. Has really been a tremendous knock to get his side to this point, despite the early blows. India will be glad to see Raina into form, not to mention Dhoni, who is ticking over nicely at the other end
now eases away a run down to long on
fires in a full delivery, down the leg side, as the umpire signals to the scorers
defended off the back foot to this slow, back of a length from Mupariwa
struck away down to long off to end the over
just forces away a drive past the bowler as the equation is brought down to 39 off 30
short of length delivery on the leg stump which Dhoni works down to short fine leg
India looking to get away at a canter as this slow bouncer is hooked away fine through the leg side for four more
now sensibly gets away a single down to long on. Poor bowling and fielding in the last few overs have made their mark here for Zimbabwe
cuts through Dhoni with this short of a length as he looked to get this away through midwicket with a pull
gets an edge to this shortish length that comes back into the right-hander. Taylor ends up taking this one on the bounce

on the back foot as he tried to pull away through short backward square. The fielder is able to pick it up and fire in a throw at the striker's end, with Raina not even in the picture, but he misses. Would have been interesting had that struck
uses that famous bottom hand of his to lift this low full toss over to long on
lofts this fuller length down to the fielder at long off, who is able to come forward rapidly before this one just fell just short of him. Hard to call it a dropped chance really
Dhoni trying to get this over with as he sends a big tonk wide over long on, but is lucky for this not to go to hand as there was a fielder in the vicinity
brings back flashes of April 2, 2011 with this club down long on, except this was hit a lot straighter than the famous, World Cup winning strike. Ends up sailing over the rope anyways
bowls a full toss which is powered away through long leg for another boundary. Poor delivery which was treated with utter disdain by the Indian captain
bowls a low, full toss which is steered away comfortably to midwicket
slants in a short of a length ball which goes down leg which is penalised by the umpire
waits on this slow, back of a length before dabbing away softly on the off side
short fine leg does well to keep this attempted tickle down the leg side to just one
cuts away hard now, square off the wicket, as he is able to return back in time for the second
short, wide delivery which gives the umpire another chance to stretch his arms. Zimbabwe have really fallen away in these last eight to ten overs. Brings back that 80/20 rule around their cricket
tries to get away a single through third man, but is held by the fielder inside of the ring
another slower ball from Chatara which Raina taps towards point, looking for the quick single, but Dhoni is not keen
shortish and on the stumps as Raina is hurried on the pull shot, but manages to send it to deep mid-icket
reaches out to this fuller one going across him, but fails to get it away
just guides this low full toss through long off for an easy single

low full toss which is now sent screaming away to deep extra-cover, with the boundary rider doing really well to cut this off before the rope. Even though this match seems a foregone conclusion, the commitment was excellent. India now need 6 to win, with Dhoni on strike

and Dhoni finishes off the match in the grandest of style, sending this short delivery high over backward square to seal a six-wicket victory for India, and more importantly, ensure they go undefeated through the group stages
